Edges-Background -- Male Avion Veteran Adventurer
Attributes (8 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d6 Spirit: d8 Strength: d6 Vigor: d8
Skills (12 Points):
Academics: (sma) d4 Language (Avion): (sma) d10 Science: (sma) d6
Athletics: (agi) d6 Notice: (sma) d6+2 Stealth: (agi) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Occult: (sma) d6 Survival: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4-3
Healing: (sma) d4 Research: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Alertness: +2 Notice
Keen Senses: +1 Notice die
Mean: -1 Persuasion
Ugly+: -2 Persuasion
Very Attractive: Increased Attractive effects
Aristocrat: +2 Persuasion (networking with aristocrats)/+2 Common Knowledge (etiquette, heraldry, gossip)
Attractive: +2 Performance (attracted target)/+2 Persuasion (attracted target)
Brute: Use Strength for Athletics
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Charismatic: Reroll Persuasion
Fame: +2 Persuasion (influencing friendly individuals)
Flight: Uses Athletics for flight maneuvers
Size: 1
Advances: 9 Improvement Points: 22 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 6; Edge: 16
Description Notes: Brawny: +1 Size/+1 Strength die for encumbrance and minimum strength requirements
Features
Edges (9 points): Alertness; Ambidextrous; Arcane Background (Gifted); Arcane Resistance; Aristocrat; Attractive; Berserk; Brave; Brawny; Brute; Charismatic; Elan; Fame; Famous; Fast Healer; Filthy Rich; Fleet-Footed; Great Luck; Improved Arcane Resistance; Linguist; Luck; Quick; Rich; Very Attractive Hindrances: Cautious; Mean; Ugly+ Avion Features: Can't Swim; Flight; Frail; Keen Senses; Reduced Pace
Feature Notes:
Famous: Increased Fame effects
Filthy Rich: Increased Rich effects
Great Luck: Increased Luck effects
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Elan: +2 on Benny-purchased trait rerolls
Fame: 5x fee from performing
Linguist: d6 in 3 Language skills
Luck: +2 Benny each session
Mean: Ill-tempered and disagreeable
Rich: 5x starting funds
Combat
Toughness: 8 (3) Parry: 5 (3) Cover: -4 Pace/Run: 7/+d6
Armor: Bronze Corselet Shield: Ballistic Shield Weapons: Gatling Gun: 1 (+0 2d8 R24'); H&K MP5: 1 (+0 2d6 R12'); Long Bow: 1 (+0 2d6 R15'); Unarmed: 1 (+0 0+d6)
Combat Notes:
Fleet-Footed: +2 Pace/+1 Run die
Frail: -1 Toughness
Reduced Pace: -1 Pace/-1 Run die
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Ambidextrous: No off-hand penalty, Parry bonuses stack
Berserk: Injury gives +1 Strength die, wild attacks, +2 Toughness, and critical failure hits randomly for 10 rd (Sma neg)
Brute: +1/+2/+4 thrown weapon range
Can't Swim: Swim Pace 2
Fast Healer: +2 Vigor (natural healing), check every 3 dy
Flight: Fly Pace 12
Quick: Redraw Action Card under 6
Save Notes:
Improved Arcane Resistance: Increased Arcane Resistance effects
Arcane Resistance: -4 others' targeted arcane skill, -4 magical damage
Brave: +2 fear checks, -2 fear table roll
